Imagine you are an office worker. You are near the printer. Your boss walks by and tells you, “Please add some paper to the copier.” You want to avoid adding paper to the copier.
What is your choice:
A. You add two sheets of paper to the copier.
B. You completely refill the copier with paper.
C. You do not add any paper to the copier.
